title: One chest not appearing.
body: I bought four hextech chests and keys, and I tried to open one, and it gave me nothing. I am kinda disappointed, as I was really close to getting a champion shard that I could infuse with essence. If I could get a chest and key to redeem, that would be great.

replies.body:
well i did a reroll with 3 skins and an error showed up so i closed client and opened it again andi had no skin shards.
did i get something and if yes can i somehow see it?
Ohhh, thanks! It didnt appear, so I thought I just didnt get anything. My screen froze for a little after getting it. Thanks!

It's strange to hear that you didn't get anything, so I took a look into this for you.  I found that you unlocked a PROJECT: Yi Icon summoner icon and 150 orange essences.   Your icon was automatically unlocked, so you didn't have to combine any resources to create it.  Let me know if that clears things up!
